biotools.summary: Designed to analyze (aligned) gene libraries, in particular in case that codon directed mutagenesis was applied to them. The program generates several tables providing information about trinucleotide characteristics, deletions, substitutions and amino acids distributions.

bioschemas.name: MuSi
bioschemas.summary: Designed to analyze (aligned) gene libraries, in particular in case that codon directed mutagenesis was applied to them. The program generates several tables providing information about trinucleotide characteristics, deletions, substitutions and amino acids distributions.
